DOC.criteria: intact respiratory drive ; PaO2/FiO2 ratio > 150 positive endexpiratory pressure ( PEEP ) ≤ 8 cmH2O ; pH 7.35 7.45 ; patient alert , conscious , cooperative Glasgow Coma Scale ≥ 10. infection , sepsis septic shock ; ( fever ) hemodynamic instability ; respiratory centre depression ; esophageal deformity , gastric/esophageal illness ; previous recent gastric/esophageal surgery .
